title: The Cursed Chest of Captain Blackheart
starting_description: The salty air bites at your face as you stand on a remote, forgotten isle. Before you, half-buried in the sand, lies the legendary chest of Captain Blackheart, rumored to hold unimaginable riches and dark secrets. Three intricate locks seal its fate, each demanding a different challenge to yield its bounty.

paths.description: The first lock is an ancient brass compass embedded into the chest. It has a dial with various pictures and a single red button. A weathered inscription around it reads: 'To truly navigate the seas, you must first find your bearing, then trust in the heart of the journey.'
paths.hint: Which tool guides your way across the endless blue? // What color beats in a brave pirate's heart?
paths.death_text: The compass spins wildly, then snaps, sending splinters of brass flying. A ghostly whisper warns, 'Lost at sea, forever bound!' The lock is sealed by an unseen force.

paths.description: A strange, flexible coil wraps around the second lock, almost like a massive tentacle. It pulses faintly. There's a small sensor on one end and a dial with numbers on the other. A chilling rhyme is etched into the wood: 'Count the legs of the beast, then give it no light.'
paths.hint: How many powerful arms does the legendary Kraken possess? // How do you plunge a room into darkness?
paths.death_text: The coil tightens, crushing the lock with immense force. A deep, guttural growl echoes from the depths. The chest begins to sink into the sand, lost to the hungry sea.

paths.description: The final lock resembles a small, rusted powder keg with a yellow button and a picture dial. A cryptic message is carved: 'The spark of fury must first ignite, then the earth shall tremble with all its might. Once the tremor subsides, press the color of gold to claim your right.'
paths.hint: What explosive device starts a mighty blast? // How does the ground react to such a powerful force? // What hue shines brightest from a pirate's treasure?
paths.death_text: A faulty charge detonates prematurely! The keg explodes, blasting the chest to splinters and scattering the treasure to the winds. You are caught in the blast.
